name: S.U.R.V.I.V.E
description:
S.U.R.V.I.V.E is a 2D sidescroller shooter game where your only objective (yet) is to shoot and kill endless horde of zombies. The game is in development and some mechanics and features are subjected to change in the near future.

Controls:-  AD-Left and Right, Spacebar/W-Jump, Left Mouse Button-Shoot
